casebody.data:
HYDE
v.
STATE of N.C. No. 88P15-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 9, 2015. Mason W. Hyde, Salisbury, for Hyde, Mason White. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of October 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Writ of Error Coram Nobis:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of October 2015."
